entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Ear Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:25 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -29.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ear Falls 08:00 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023
Temperature: -29.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -34
Dewpoint: -32.3°C
Wind: SSW 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 22.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 41 this morning and minus 33 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 08:20 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 08:20 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023
